pages.text: $(li)The Burngin Ashes is a material that can be used to summon an $(l:patchouli:bosses/rumor_ignis)Old Champion$(/l) in the $(l:patchouli:structures/burning_arena)Burning Arena$(/l).$(br)$(li)It only can be dropped by a $(l:patchouli:creatures/cataclysm/ignited_revenant)Ignited Revenant$(/l).
